metadata.description: Spells that control, direct, and manipulate air, wind, weather, and atmospheric phenomena

spells.name: Gentle Touch of the Persuaded Breeze
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to control gentle breezes and air currents. The wind can be directed to blow in any direction, carry scents, cool the air, or provide a refreshing breeze. The effect is subtle and pleasant.

spells.name: Wings of Soaring Wind
spells.description: This spell allows the target to fly by controlling air currents around their body. The person can soar through the sky with ease, moving at roughly the speed of a galloping horse. Flight requires concentration but becomes natural after a few minutes.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (support person in air), +1 Touch, +2 Sun

spells.name: Gust of Vindictive Wind
spells.description: This spell creates a powerful gust of wind that can knock down a person or creature. The wind strikes with enough force to send someone tumbling and can extinguish fires, scatter papers, or disrupt delicate activities.

spells.name: Circling Winds of Protection
spells.description: This spell creates a barrier of swirling wind around the target that deflects projectiles and provides protection. Arrows, crossbow bolts, and thrown weapons are blown off course, while the wind also helps dissipate the effects of gas attacks or inhaled poisons.

spells.name: Command the Storm's Fury
spells.description: This powerful spell allows the caster to control existing weather systems, directing storms, changing wind patterns, and influencing precipitation across a vast area. The spell can calm hurricanes or intensify gentle rains into thunderstorms.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (control major weather), +3 Sight, +1 Concentration, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Invisible Hand of the Air
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to manipulate objects at a distance using controlled air currents. Small objects can be lifted, moved, or manipulated as if by an invisible hand. The effect is precise enough to turn pages, ring bells, or perform simple tasks.

spells.name: Lightning's Guided Path
spells.description: This spell directs natural or magical lightning to strike a specific target. The lightning follows an unnatural path through the air, bending around obstacles to reach its intended victim. The electrical discharge deals massive damage (+20) to the target.

spells.name: Chamber of Still Air
spells.description: This spell creates a zone of perfectly still air where no wind can penetrate. The area becomes completely calm regardless of weather conditions outside. This provides protection from wind-based attacks and creates ideal conditions for delicate work.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (control air in area), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +2 Room

spells.name: Whirlwind of Grasping Air
spells.description: This spell creates a powerful whirlwind around the caster that can lift and hurl objects or people. The swirling winds can pick up multiple targets and either hold them suspended in the air or throw them considerable distances.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create major wind phenomenon), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration

spells.name: Voices on the Wind
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to carry their voice on the wind to any location within sight. The voice can be made to seem to come from any direction and can be as loud or as quiet as desired. Multiple conversations can be maintained simultaneously.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (carry sound on air), +3 Sight, +1 Concentration

spells.name: Prison of Swirling Winds
spells.description: This spell traps a target within a cage of violently swirling winds. The wind barrier is impossible to pass through, as the air currents are strong enough to hurl back anyone who tries to escape. The prisoner can breathe but cannot leave the wind prison.
